version_description:
Hello Hollywood Big Shots!

here's some news for you:

- a whole new studio system with 15 new buildings
- improved graphics
- variable actor careers
- much more information on your current and past movies and on your competitors movies
- better game balance
- performance improvements
- bugfixes

…and please don’t forget to give us a new review!
Sorry, in the last update there was a bug-fix, that lead to new problems...

events like awards,product placements & studio-desasters
reviewing of scripts
bug-fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

can copy cast/crew from previous movies
fast waiting
changed sequel-rules
changed event-probabilities (especially fire)
bug-fixes
